inclusion.criterion: pre- or post-menopausal women with Stage 0, I and II breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biopsy-proven invasive breast cancer, excised with negative margins of at least 1 mm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Status post segmental mastectomy, after sentinel node biopsy and/or axillary node dissection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 2 weeks from last chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient needs to be able to understand and demonstrate willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous radiation therapy to the ipsilateral breast
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than 3 involved nodes identified at axillary staging, requiring adjuvant axillary radiation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with Stage I breast cancer. She had lumpectomy and clear margins. Tumor was HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
